TEXT.TITLE: TRUST AMERICA <TRUS> IN DEAL WITH ITT <ITT>
TEXT.BODY: Trust America Service Corp said it has signed an agreement to provide ITT Corp's <ITT> ITT Mortgage Corp affiliate with a monthly flow of residential conventional mortgage loans. It said the arrangement is expected to be an "important: source of revenue. Reuter
